title: Quick and Easy White Chili
directions: In a large stockpot, saute onions and garlic in olive oil until transparent.  Stir in the chilies, cumin, and oregano.  Cook and stir 2 to 3 minutes more.   Add broth, pork, and beans; bring to a boil.  Reduce the heat to a simmer, and cook uncovered for 20 minutes.
Remove from heat, and stir in the cheese until melted.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can great Northern beans, rinsed and drained
